Dialogue.Value: You’re pretty good at virus,busting，Alice.
I can’t operate my Navi very,well，so I’m pretty bad at virus,busting.
Alice Shinki!,Good morning!
I’m an early bird，so,I’m never late! Never!
Do you not know what a,PET is?
Would you like me，Remilia，,to tell you about them?
PET stands for,”Program Enable Terminal”.
It’s not only your NetNavi’s,home，but also the generic,name of the software that
lets you adjust your NetNavi.
With a Navi，you can send,email from anywhere.
You peasants like to put your,PETs in tacky plastic cases，,but high-class ladies like
myself wear an elegant,wristwatch!
How boring....
Remilia is the daughter of the,wealthy Scarlet family.
She’s supposed to be in grade,school，but she skipped a,couple of grades.
I’m about the same height as,her....
....But I didn’t skip any grades.
Yo，Alice!,You just made it!
Did Shanghai do somethin’,again?
Listen，Mari!,Shanghai cut the alarm off,all on her own!
....Again，huh?,That never gets old.
Marisa! You’re a Navi，so,talk with her!
Won’t matter what I say，right?,Shanghai is somethin’ else.
If it involves a cyber steak，,I might consider it.
You little....!!
This is why a cheap Navi,is simply no good.
You callin’ me cheap?
Hey，Remilia!,Say it to my face!
Milady，bickering with Navis,is unladylike.
You’re right，Sakuya.,Why bother arguing with such,a shoddy Navi?
Even a rich kid like you would,be mad if someone called her,Navi shoddy.
Whether a Navi is good or bad,has nothing to do with money!
You put your own interests,above your own Navi’s，so,who’re you to judge?
It sounds like trouble!,It does!
Oh，Rika Shikuma?,What does this have to do,with you?
When someone acts so high,and mighty like that，we can’t,just ignore it.
See，my TankMan is saying,the same thing! He is!
That said，you won’t get me,to back off by insulting me.,I’m not that petty.
Oh? Is it a match you want?,If so，I’ll gladly humor you.
Yo，that’s a bit....,Doesn’t look like this is,gonna end well.
Hmm....,I think a match sounds fine.
You bet!
We should be virus busting,in sixth period today!
I see! So we should see,who can get the best time,and busting rank?
Fine by me!
Well，it’s not like you can,beat Sakuya and I.
Now you’ve said it....,Shanghai，do whatever it,takes to beat Remilia!
#b@true#BING#w@45# BONG#w@45# BING#w@45# BONG!#w@45#,,#b@false#
Homeroom is starting!,Everyone take your seats!
Teacher’s here，huh?,Let’s go ahead and take,our seats.
....Wonderful!,Another day of full attendance!
Today’s sixth period class,is in the PC Room with,Ms. Asakura.
Don’t be late，everyone!
Now，please get ready for,first period!
Six hours later....
Alright! Time for our match,with Sakuya!
Let’s go to the PC Room!
The PC Room is on the,second floor，in the hall,past the stairwell.
How’d it go，Alice?
I did my best.,How about you，Remilia?
Ahaha!,I just saw your time!
Well，well，well.,Looks like the commoners,couldn’t keep up.
What!? 0.07 seconds!?
No way!,Did you use rare chips!?
Oh? So you think we cheated，,do you?
Building a good chip folder,is key to NetBattling!
I just have better chips than,you. That’s all there is to it!
Well then，I’ll take my leave.,It’s time for my lessons at,home.
Ciao，loser!
YOU BRAAAAAAAAAT!
I should have good chips too，,like that brat’s Navi!
That’s enough，Shanghai.,You’re starting to sound like,a cartoon villain.
Yeah，but it’s still annoying....
Aaaah，maybe there’s a,rare 6000 damage chip,lying around somewhere.
If only....
....Actually，I think I remember,something like that! I do!
What!? Really!?,Gimme the details!
Hm....,It was yesterday，wasn’t it?
They say a suspicious Navi,buried some chips in Genso,Area at midnight.
Could it be....?,Rare chips!?
Might be.
Why else would someone be,hiding things in the middle of,the night?
It has to be some kind of,treasure.
Well，how about that!,Thanks，TankMan!
I’ll have to take you on a date,sometime soon!
Wha!? Really!?
Jokes aside....,Alice，let’s hurry home,and get on the web!
You got it!,I don’t want to keep losing,like this either!
(So she was just joking....)
(I feel your pain，TankMan....)
Oh yeah! If you’re goin’ on the,net，watch out for ROM.
ROM? They’re that net crime,group that’s been all over the,news，right?
Yeah. I’ve heard there’s,been some incidents here,in Genso Town.
The worst I’ve heard is that,some people’s fridges have,been goin’ haywire.
One house is frozen solid，,and no one knows what to do.
Why would ROM want to,freeze houses? Too early to,make snowmen outdoors?
I made my own antifreeze at,home just in case，but I dunno,if it actually works.
Anyways，as I was sayin’，,watch out for suspicious folks.
Yeah，yeah!,If any punks show their faces，,I’ll thrash ’em good!
Ahaha....,At least we can count on that.
Alright，I’ll see you all later!
See ya!
I guess I should head home,soon.
Oh，how ’bout a NetBattle,before I go?
I guess I should head home,soon.
Sigh....,Of all the people to fall for....
TankMan....,Your feelings will reach her,someday. They will.
....and that’s how we stopped,the fridge.
Wow!,You did great! You did!
Hey!,I did most of the work!
Wait a sec!,Don’t forget about me!
But I was the one who actually,fought the ROM Navi!
You fought a ROM Navi?
Ms. Asakura!,What are you doing here?
I’m on after-school patrol.
Alice Shinki，was it?,Did you fight against a,ROM Navi?
That’s right! And I gave,’em a good beating too!
Should we be worried about,something?
Maybe. From what I know，,ROM Navis have odd combat,programs installed in them.
Would it be alright for me to,examine you?
I’m not a huge fan of other,people messing with my body.
But she’s willing to do us a,favor. We should be grateful.
Fufu.... I understand.,I can’t do it here，so come,to the PC Room.
Okay，I’ll stop by later.
Well then，I’ll go ahead and,get everything ready in the,PC Room.
Looks like the former scholar,isn’t exactly what I expected....
Former scholar?
Hm?,Alice，don’t you know?
Before becoming a teacher，,Ms. Asakura was a scholar,overseas.
Well，that’s just a rumor.,Who knows if it’s true or not?
We hear rumors like that all,the time on the net.
So I was the only one who,didn’t know....
But now that you know，you,aren’t left out anymore!,You aren’t!
Hahaha!,Rika’s as positive as always!
Shouldn’t ya go soon?,Won’t it be bad to keep the,teacher waitin’?
Yeah.,Alright，I’m off!
Let’s just get this over with〜!
Ms. Asakura is waitin’ for ya,in the PC Room.,Better get movin’!
Welcome back!,How was your checkup?
All systems green!,What did you expect?
Oh yeah，Mari!,I have something to ask you.
Dr. Morichika at Genso,University is your dad，right?
Yep!,Why? What’s up?
We want to go see him and,get this data analyzed.,Can you make it happen?
Huh? That’s all?
I’ll ask him real quick，but it,shouldn’t be a problem.
Marisa is modeled after mom，,after all.,But she’s over in Eurica，so....
Oh，so it’s that kind of,relationship....
But I can’t wait to meet him!,Let’s get going to the,University!
If you’re going to the University，,you should take the metro!
You can ride for free with a,student pass! You can!
A student renewing their,metro pass gets that pass,free for a year.
Ah!,I don’t have a student metro,pass yet!
It’s alright. They can issue,them over the net nowadays.
Yeah! In the Campus Square,in City Area 1!
They’ll issue you one on,the spot!
Alright，Alice! If you’re ready，,I’ll go to the Campus Square.
Sounds good!,I’ll get a pass and be right,back!
Okay! When you’re done，,I’ll be waitin’ for ya at the,metro station.
Sounds like fun，so I’ll,tag along! I will!
Great! I’ll let dad know a few,friends are comin’ by.
They issue the passes in the,Campus Square in City Area 1.
You can get to the City Areas,from the back of Genso Area 2.
You should probably go soon!,You should!
It was fine!,It was great!
I’m looking forward to seeing,the University! I am!
I rushed to school this morning，,but we have the day off....
I rushed to school this morning，,but we have the day off....
We’re trapped....
It’s no use! The windows,are electrified too!
Wha!?,I’m not late，am I!?
Don’t worry，Alice.,We’re just starting class a bit,earlier than usual.
Oh! Okay!
Now then，is everyone doing,alright today?
We have two transfer students,joining our class today!
I wonder what they’re like!
I hope one’s a cool guy〜!
How exciting!
(....Don’t tell me.)
Please come in，you two!
Would you both please,introduce yourselves?
Sure thing!
I’m Nekku Tsubaki!,People call me the,World’s Best NetBattler!
(Wait，wasn’t he the, Blazing NetBattler?)
My favorite idol is,Mystia Lorelei!
I love NetBattling，so,anyone who wants a fight,should come at me!
Oh，and you can just call me,Tsubaki! I don’t like my first,name that much.
CLAP CLAP CLAP CLAP!
What an interesting guy!
We’ve never had a guy like,this in our class before!
....Are you alright?
I’m....Tenshi Hinanai.
Nice to meet you....
CLAP CLAP CLAP CLAP!
Maybe she’s nervous?
I know how she feels. I had,trouble fitting in at first too....
....Now，everyone get along,well with Tsubaki and Tenshi!
You two will take the two,open seats in the back.
Ms. Asakura’s information,class is right after roll call!
Information class is now,in session.
Today，we’ll be studying,viruses.
As you know，viruses are,programs which cause,computers to malfunction.
However，viruses live on,the Internet and in healthy,computers too.
So why are there viruses in,healthy computers?
Does anyone know?
Yes，Tsubaki?
Because the viruses we,usually see there aren’t,causing any trouble!
Viruses live in the cyberworld,like any animal does in nature.
They wouldn’t want to destroy,the place they call home.
As for harmful viruses，,either their power is wildly,increasing.....
Or someone maliciously,ordered them to cause harm.
So why do wild viruses attack,NetNavis?
They’re just trying to repel,invaders entering their territory.
It’s the same as a wild animal,attacking someone near its,den.
Ooooh!,So that’s why!
In short，saying that all viruses,are bad is incorrect.
Recently，some people have,been trying to improve the,cyberworld using viruses.
For example，they might,release Kedama viruses to,clean up a bug outbreak.
Even now，there are some,who tame viruses to help,them when busting.
Hmm....?,Taming viruses....?
Someday，viruses might help,make the cyberworld better,for everyone!
Next，as I was saying,last week....
#b@true#BING #w@45#BONG #w@45#BING #w@45#BONG!#w@45#,,#b@false#
Take care!,Get home safely!
So that’s what you meant by,”catch ya later”....
Anyways，how did you know,that Alice was a student here?
All the students from,Eien Middle School were,wearing uniforms，and
this was the only place I knew,that had a no-uniform policy.
Eien Middle School is the,only other middle school in,the region，after all.
What’s this?,You two know each other?
He helped me out at the,Game Center yesterday....
You met him just before he,transferred in?,What a coincidence!
I’m just glad that，thanks to,that，I can be friends with,such pretty girls!
Thank you for the compliment，,but peasants like you aren’t,my type.
You’re doin’ a great job hidin’,your motives，huh?
You started it，SpannerMan!,I saw you cozying up to Alice’s,Navi!
Oh my!
Th-Th-Th-Th-!!,That’s not true!
Oh? You were cozying up,to Shanghai?
Huh?,Who’re you to judge!?
Heh....,Looks like I need to teach,you a lesson.
Nooooo〜!,Don’t fight over little ol’ me! ♪
....How did it come to this?
Looks like you all are getting,along swimmingly〜!
Say，anyone know where,Tenshi went?
I don’t，but....
Perhaps she went home,already?
It must be sad to be alone.,This might be a good chance,to，y’know....
I want to be Tenshi’s friend too!,I do!
How about we try talking with,her tomorrow morning?
Yeah，we should.
By the way，Shanghai，,what was with your fidgetin’,in information class?
Oh，I was just thinking,about taming a virus like,Ms. Asakura said.
You want to tame a virus?
Yeah!,Sounds interesting!
Whatever floats your boat.
Ms. Asakura did say that such,an initiative was underway.
I wonder where....
In times like these，,we search the net!
Again〜? Really〜?
If it’s for Shanghai，,I’d gladly search for it....
No no no，that’s my job.
Why do you keep buttin’ in!?
Why are you so angry!?
Cool it，TankMan!
You too，SpannerMan!
Stooooooooop!,You two are so annoying!,Shut up!
Fine! I’ll just go look for it,myself then!
Sigh....,You’re kinda difficult too，,Shanghai.
Sheesh! Men....
Oh，it’s this late already?,I’m gonna head on home.
Ah，that it is!,I have a communications,class to attend.
Time to disband!
Well，catch ya tommorow.
Alright! Let’s go find some info,about virus taming on the net!
Okay，but where should,we start?
Let’s try finding the Sage,again! He should still be,able to search for it!
Hm....,I wonder if that Navi will,still be there.
Before we begin，,let’s take attendance.
Mr. Okajima!
Ms. Katou!
Ms. Shikuma!
Ms. Shinki!
Ms. Scarlet!
Mr. Tsubaki!
Ms. Hinanai!
....Ms. Hinanai?
Ms. Koa!,Tenshi’s absent!
Does anyone know where,she is?
The infirmary?
Did she get lost in the,school....?
Well，I guess I’ll go look for her.,Please study on your own until,I come back.
She expects us to just study,on our own....?
Well，what should we do?
Wait! There’s something,on the blackboard!
A suspected ROM Navi has,hijacked the school’s security,system!
Students，please remain calm,and evacuate the building!
Wha!? What’s happenin’!?
I-It said there was an,emergency!
We gotta get outta here，,pronto!
I-It shocked me....
The door’s electrified!?
Wait! That means we,can’t get out!
W-What do we do!?
As if I’d let us stay trapped,in here forever! This room,won’t unlock itself，y’know!
Right....,We have to find some way out!
I guess I should head home,soon.
Sigh....,Of all the people to fall for....
TankMan....,Your feelings will reach her,someday. They will.
I guess I should head home,soon.
I’m....numb....
Oi! Tsubaki!,Pull yourself together!
S-Shut up!
I came to get something,I left behind.
Tsubaki is really funny!
W-W-What do I do!?
Phew!,The floor is really clean now!
Alice!,Is there nothing we can do!?
I wonder where Tenshi went.
What do we do....!?
I hope Tenshi is okay.
We could have avoided this if,we’d just talked to Tenshi....
We could jack into the school,network if we had a teacher’s,ID card!
Alice!,Use that ID card to jack in!
TankMan was a big help!,He was!
Looks like that Tenshi girl just,can’t fit in....
Mornin’!
Good morning，Mari!
Did you get to talk to Tenshi?
About that....,She might be avoidin’ us ’cuz,she feels misunderstood.
Maybe she’s just shy?
That reminds me，I heard,teachers sayin’ that she was,bullied at her last school.
Bullied!?,But why....?
Who knows? It seems like,she’s transferred schools a lot.,Maybe that’s part of it....?
Why would anyone bully her?
There will always be some,people who are stronger than,the rest.
Eventually，the strong will,justify hurting the weak.
Since when were you such,an expert on stuff like this?
One of the jobs I had involved,destroying dozens of bullying,ringleaders’ social lives....
Don’t tell me....,Is that where the money for,the Link Gate came from....?
#b@true#BING#w@45# BONG#w@45# BING#w@45# BONG!#w@45#,,#b@false#
Time for homeroom!
If only we could jack into,the blackboard....
With that ID card，we can,jack into the blackboard!
Alright! Let’s get outta here!
Sakuya?,What do we do!?
The current stopped!,Let’s get outside!
I....I’m fine....!
The rest of the class already,left! We’re the only ones left!
Alright，I guess we should,go home.
Hey，Alice!,Look over there....!
Tenshi? What’s up?
Can we....walk home together?
Of course!,Let’s walk home together!
That’s how you do it，Tenshi!,That’s it!
Okay.... Um....,Can we maybe do our,introductions again?
I’ll seem more like a friend,if we start fresh，right....?
Sure thing，Tenshi!
I’m Alice Shinki!,It’s nice to meet you!
I’m Mari Morichika!,Nice to meetcha!
I’m Rika Shikuma! I am!,It’s nice to meet you! It is!
I am Remilia Scarlet.,Let’s get along well，shall we?
....Tsubaki’s fine.
Okay，got it!,I’m Tenshi Hinanai!,Nice to meet you all!
There ya go! Now ya got,nothin’ to worry about!
Everyone....,Thank you so very much!
Tenshi! If you want，you can,come play at my house!
R-Really!?,Is that okay!?
It’s quite normal for friends to,invite each other over to play.
Yaaay! Let’s all be super,best friends forever!
A dangerous high-voltage,current is flowing through,the door!
A dangerous high-voltage,current is flowing through,the door!
It’s the teacher’s desk.
Ms. Koa sometimes leaves,her teaching materials here,by mistake.
This is Ms. Koa’s ID card!
Now we can access the,school network through,the blackboard!
It’s the teacher’s desk.
Ms. Koa sometimes leaves her,teaching materials in here,by mistake.
It’s a basic student’s desk.
As expected，it doesn’t have,any technology built-in.
It’s a basic student’s desk.
As expected，it doesn’t have,any technology built-in.
It’s a basic student’s desk.
As expected，it doesn’t have,any technology built-in.
It’s a basic student’s desk.
As expected，it doesn’t have,any technology built-in.
It’s a basic student’s desk.
As expected，it doesn’t have,any technology built-in.
It’s a basic student’s desk.
As expected，it doesn’t have,any technology built-in.
....There’s something shining,in the back of the drawer.
I guess I left it here for so long,that I forgot about it.
It’s a basic student’s desk.
As expected，it doesn’t have,any technology built-in.
It’s a basic student’s desk.

It’s a basic student’s desk.
As expected，it doesn’t have,any technology built-in.
It’s a basic student’s desk.
As expected，it doesn’t have,any technology built-in.
It’s the class schedule.
Each class has a different,teacher.
Our homeroom teacher，,Ms. Koa，teaches Japanese.
It’s Ms. Koa’s handmade list of,class chores.
On Mondays，each chore,shifts down the list to the,next student.
Whew! Looks like I won’t be on,toilet duty any time soon.
This classroom has an,interactive blackboard.
We use electronic chalk so it,doesn’t get dirty.,I’m glad it’s easy to clean.
We can also jack in to show,projects we made on our,computers.
However，the port is locked to,prevent student mischief.
This classroom has an,interactive blackboard.
We use electronic chalk so it,doesn’t get dirty.,I’m glad it’s easy to clean.
Since I have a Teacher’s ID,Card，I can jack in!
Challenge Mari to a,NetBattle?
Alright! Let’s do it，Marisa!
Yo，you feelin’ okay?
Looks like brute force won’t,really work on you two，huh?
Marisa! Show ’em how much,you’ve powered up!
Yo，you feelin’ okay?
I lost again....!
Now here’s your prize!
Just kiddin’!,I updated my P-Code and,forgot to give ya a copy.
Now just happened to be a,good time to hand it over!
Full throttle!,We won’t lose this time!
Yo，you feelin’ okay?
You guys are too strong!
Really? Harsh....
COMBAT TEST
COMBAT TEST
I’ve got to study! I heard the test,covers what we were learning,during the ROM incident!
I heard the quiz kid in the hall,has a master out there,somewhere.
Not in the real world，though.,Somewhere in the Cyber World.
I can’t believe I’m in the same,class as the girl who saved,the world!
Could I have your autograph，,please， beautiful ang-,Where are you going?!
